name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Font Tester - Preview 1000+ fonts on any webpage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test and preview 1000+ font on any webpage. Made for developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Test 1000+ google fonts on your website. Typography defines your brand, but getting the fonts right is no easy task, so use font tester to pick right font and elevate your brand.

Install Font Tester and preview over 1000+ google fonts and copy the code directly from the widget.

Font tester 3.0+ is here, here's what's new 🔥:
➤ Compare multiple fonts live (premium users)
➤ Now identify fonts on any page using the new target feature
➤ Now cycle fonts using arrow keys (enable in settings)
➤ New settings modal
➤ Preview fonts on the drop-down.
➤ Bug fixes regarding zIndex and more. 
➤ read more about change logs on github pages.

Feature Highlights 🔥
✔️ Works on any website. 
✔️ Just highlight a text before selecting a font.
✔️ Select from 1000+ Google fonts
✔️ Instantly copy the code for the font from the widget
✔️ Intuitive UI
✔️ Open-source, you can find the source code at: https://github.com/PaulleDemon/font-tester-chrome

Here’s a list of additional features that enable developers to find relevant utilities quickly:

➤ Change font weights using the slider
➤ Change the line height
➤ Set Italics, Underline
➤ The widget can be moved anywhere in the webpage

Personal data 🔒
Font Tester will not collect any personal data, browsing history, etc.

Additionally, there is an optional one-time license to support the open-source development. Plus you get additional benefits like Priority support, Upcoming features like, Dark mode, adjust font-size, early access and Edge/Firefox addons and more. 

Buy your license here: https://foxcraft.gumroad.com/l/font-tester/preorder
